item.description:
Yo everyone, sign up. We will climb Metro Rock on Mondays. Let's have fun.

You will need to be belay tested if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can also take a class if you have never climbed before. They have a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car. Look up Metro Rock's web site - or call them:

Give me a call with your questions: 617 320-4979 (before 6PM.)
Philip
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the picnic table and introduce yourself. We pair off and start climbing at 7:15. Boulderers welcome too!
item.name: Metrorock Everett
